info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Brown County through 315 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Owens, or near May, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Byrds, Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty, Grosvenor, Lake Brownwood State Park, May, Cross Cut, Lake Brownwood, Owens and Thrifty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
